name: Tarihin Pesinde - Izmir
description:
Tarihin Pesinde - İzmir is developed during Tech İzmir Game Jam in 36 hours.

In this game your goal is to open unknown areas and discovering parts of the İzmir.

Portion of source codes and assets are taken from external sources during competition.

Music is also taken from outside.

Team

Musahan Sever - Programmer and Level Designer

Hasan Can Devşir - Art Director and 3D Artist

Yiğit Yılmaz - Game Designer and Programmer

Berkay Gülbeyaz - Dialogues and Story
